module.name: Class of Service
module.description: COMMERCIAL MODULE, REQUIRES A LICENSE. Class of Service allows you to limit access, per extension, to feature codes, trunks, queues, ring groups, etc.
module.changelog: *13.0.11.3* FREEPBX-14316 COS name with space not working *13.0.11.2* Internal fixes *13.0.11.1* FREEPBX-13507 CoS routes not being respected when using Follow Me *13.0.11* Support for PHP 5.6 *13.0.10* Remove en_US Translations *13.0.9* FREEPBX-10889 Dont show user created groups as they will always be denied *13.0.8* Slideout menu *13.0.7.1* Fix potential un-init'ed variables *13.0.7* FREEPBX-10209 htmlentities need to use UTF-8 *13.0.6* Properly display routes if we have any and clean up localization if extensionroutes is not installed or licensed. *13.0.5* All sections working. *13.0.4.1* FREEPBX-9875 fix licensing HARDER *13.0.4* FREEPBX-9655 fix licensing *13.0.3* Add missing tabs from transition to 13 *13.0.2* Version bump Beta *13.0.1alpha2* FREEPBX-9473 Class of Service Items Overflow and other display issues *13.0.1alpha1* Visuals *12.0.18* Only check RingGroups that need to be checked. *12.0.17* FREEPBX-8669 - Fix logic error *12.0.16* FREEPBX-8301 dont explode if contactmanager is not installed *12.0.15* Add Contact Manager groups. *12.0.14* Skip CoS checks on ALL external calls *12.0.13* Check for sysadmin first before attempting to ask for license *12.0.12* Resolve issue with DIDs with no Routes causing crash *12.0.11* Licensing updates *12.0.9* Add Time Condition and Day/Night Toggle support. *12.0.8* Change Feature Codes to display name *12.0.7* Ensure 'Reload' bar is triggered. *12.0.6* Initial Release
